title: Never Look Back
description: In Never Look Back, the conclusion of the Emi Lost & Found series, Emi Hennigan continues her quest for a happy ending with a man who loves her unconditionally. When she receives some unexpected news, she realizes she may never be able to give Jack Holland everything he wants. If Jack truly wants to be with her, Emi will have to convince him that she is worth the sacrifices he'll be forced to make.The final book in the Emi Lost & Found series
author: Lori L. Otto
